response.original_title: Mil Pássaros no Bairro do Padre Cruz
response.overview: Mil Pássaros no Bairro Padre Cruz shows how the development of an artistic intervention can being welfare to a community. Children, young people and the elderly let themselves be swept away by the transformative power of art and let loose the ability we all have to express the best in all of us.
response.title: Mil Pássaros no Bairro do Padre Cruz
